summary:
Add new Ash Spawn Follower!
He is in The Retching Netch at Raven Rock.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/36408-1-1369646612.jpg[/img]

[font=Georgia][size=6][color=Orangered]-Description-[/color][/size][/font]
[size=4][FONT=Arial Black]Add New Ash Spawn Follower,his name is \"[color=Orangered]Radeel[/color]\".
You will find him in The Retching Netch at Raven Rock.[/font][/size]


[font=Georgia][size=6][color=Red]-Combat-[/color][/size][/font]
[size=4][FONT=Arial Black]He is essntial,and his level synchronize your level.
And [u]the higher his level,the stronger spell he will learn.[/u]
At the beginning,he has unique weapon \"Radeel\'s War Axe\".[/font][/size]

[font=Georgia][size=6][color=Tomato]-Background-[/color][/size][/font]
[size=4][FONT=Arial Black]He was Dunmer Treasure Hunter in old days,and died during traveling.
But long years later,he revived as Ash Spawn.
Fortunately he didn\'t lost his voice,he is living as one of Raven Rock people after some troubles.
[/font][/size]

[size=3][FONT=Arial Black][color=Greenyellow ]Required:Dragonborn[/color][/font][/size]
author: metametroid
